channel.title: vIDM on Chris Neales Blog
channel.description: Recent content in vIDM on Chris Neales Blog

item.title: VMworld Europe Schedule and New things to do this time
item.description: I’ve filled up my schedule, I’ve Favourited sessions that were full so I can check the standby queues out and here’s a few other things I want to tick off this time round at VMworld Surf the hall more. Last year I waited until the Thursday but had some great talks with folks at Simplivity, Pernixdata and others...don't know why I was so shy but this time I'm going to be asking lots of questions.
